Posts.Title: In your 40's with low Oncotype score, what was your decision? gracebead p22nut5

Posts.Content: Oct 27, 2016 07:22AM Rebeccam wrote: Hello Doreen, I received an Onco test of 19, and my oncologist recommended Chemotherapy but didn't really go into the specifics of other options...I am concerned about the risks of Chemotherapy....very much so...I started at Stage 1 but upon removal that showed clear margins, I ended up at stage 2, grade 3 aggressive...I am 46, a mom...Was contemplating 2nd opinion....as my gut instinct is telling me not to do chemo....feel like the risks of chemo outweigh the percent risk of recurrence....pressure to make decision soon.
